full_summary:
# Occupational Health and Safety Management System (OHSMS) Tender
## Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Title**: Occupational Health and Safety Management System (OHSMS)
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000246284
* **Closing Date**: February 22, 2023, 2:00 pm Eastern Time

## Description
**The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)/ Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) requires an Occupational Health and Safety Management System (OHSMS) through a software as a service (SaaS) with an initial contract period of two (2) years and up to eight (8) additional one-year option periods.**

## Objective
The Department needs an OHSMS that will compile, store, manage, monitor, and report occupational health and safety (OHS)-related information and demonstrate compliance with OSH legal requirements.

## Security Requirements
The tender must meet the security requirements outlined in the solicitation package prior to contract award.

## Attachments
* Addendum 1
* Addendum 2
* Addendum 3
* Invitation for Bids (RFQ)
* Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Eligibility
Eligible bidders may be required to satisfy the requirements of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement.

## Special Instructions
Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Canadian Government Electronic Tendering Service platform before the specified deadline.

## Point of Contact
* Name: Vanessa Demers-Lamothe
* Email: [vanessa.demers-lamothe@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:vanessa.demers-lamothe@sac-isc.gc.ca)

Note that the most important information has been preserved and rephrased in a clear and concise manner. The rewritten entry is formatted in a more professional pattern and formatted as a standard Government tender.

---
